This uses the functions [`insert.ring`](https://rdrr.io/cran/dplR/man/insert.ring.html), [`delete.ring`](https://rdrr.io/cran/dplR/man/insert.ring.html), and  [`combine.rwl`](https://rdrr.io/cran/dplR/man/combine.rwl.html) to return a rwl object.

### Instructions

1. Highlight a row in the table. 
2. Edit using "Delete" or "Insert"
3. Review previous tabs to assess effect of the edits.
4. Click "Revert" to undo your edits or "Download" to write out the rwl file.
